divs: Sighting DetailsWe were vacationing in Las Vegas last spring break. We were sightseeing and I was taking pictures with my cell phone. I dont remember if we were on a bus or walking at the time but if we were on the bus I dont remember and ceiling lights that could have created the image. Any ways I did not notice the object or reflection until I got home a few days later. I did not photoshop the image and dont even know how to do it if I wanted to. The image shows a somewhat transparent saucer shape. I emailed mufon and he did a preliminary assessment and he noticed a dark object at the top left of the photo that I did not see until he pointed it out. I am a person that doesnt like drawing attention to themselves. I simply cannot explain what is on my photo and am seeking help explaining the out of place object. I will provide everything I can to prove I didnt fake the photo if needed. I will send the photo but it needs to be rotated so I will send the original photo and the rotated photo for viewing. Also I will send the details of both photos that were saved by the phone before and after the rotation.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around March 13th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Photo taken on vacation in Las Vegas. Was not even noticed till days later
